metadata.title: CVE-2020-11060 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In GLPI before 9.4.6, an attacker can execute system commands by abusingthe backup functionality. Theoretically, this vulnerability can beexploited by an attacker without a valid account by using a CSRF. Due tothe difficulty of the exploitation, the attack is only conceivable by anaccount having Maintenance privileges and the right to add WIFI networks.This is fixed in version 9.4.6.

criterions.comment: glpi package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
